title: Ex-Abercrombie & Fitch CEO fit to stand trial, prison officials say
subtitle: Mike Jeffries, who was ruled "mentally incompetent" by a court, is now  competent to stand trial, medical experts declare after a forensic evaluation.
full_text: Mike Jeffries, who was ruled "mentally incompetent" by a court, is now  competent to stand trial, medical experts declare after a forensic evaluation.
